title: 6.NI.1
text: The student will outline the advantages and disadvantages of transmitting information over the Internet, including speed, reliability, cost, and security.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Explain the role of the Internet in social life, culture, and the economy.
Explain data transfer and the impact of connectivity speed when data is going from one device to another.
Compare the speed and reliability of various data transmission media.
Describe the advantages and disadvantages of transporting information over the Internet.
